What is the Hutton Report? I have heard it twice today... I assume something to do with Britain...

 
 Simply put, a british government scientist called kelly commited suicide After his name was leaked to the press.
 
 Some reporter ran a story on the bbc saying the government lied about iraqs WMDs before the war. 
 
 Then the government tried to blame kelly, then the bbc accused the government of lying, then everybody argued why kellys name was released as the source of a leak.
 
 Blair charged hutton (his friend) to run a public enquiry as to what all went wrong.
